posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

echo $i; $i++; if ($i <= 10) { doloop3(); }}doloop3(); 1234567891011121314151617#  $data = [ ['id' => 1, 'title' => 'Electronics', 'parent_id' => 0], ['id' => 2, 'title' => 'Laptops & PC', 'parent_id' => 1], ['id' => 3, 'title' => 'Laptops', 'parent_id' => 2], ['id' => 4, 'title' => 'PC', 'parent_id' => 2], ['id' => 5, 'title' => 'Cameras & photo', 'parent_id' => 1], ['id' => 6, 'title' => 'Camera', 'parent_id' => 5], ['id' => 7, 'title' => 'Phones & Accessories', 'parent_id' => 1], ['id' => 8, 'title' => 'Smartphones', 'parent_id' => 7], ['id' => 9, 'title' => 'Android', 'parent_id' => 8], ['id' => 10, 'title' => 'iOS', 'parent_id' => 8], ['id' => 11, 'title' => 'Other Smartphones', 'parent_id' => 8], ['id' => 12, 'title' => 'Batteries', 'parent_id' => 7], ['id' => 13, 'title' => 'Headsets', 'parent_id' => 7], ['id' => 14, 'title' => 'Screen Protectors', 'parent_id' => 7],]; 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354/** *  * * @param array $data * @return array */function make_tree($data){ $refer = array(); $tree = array(); foreach($data as $k => $v){ $refer[$v['id']] = & $data[$k]; // } foreach($data as $k => $v){ $parent_id = $v['parent_id']; //id if($parent_id == 0){ $tree[] = & $data[$k]; // }else{ if(isset($refer[$parent_id])){ $refer[$parent_id]['children'][] = & $data[$k]; // } } } return $tree; }/** *  * * @param array $data * @param int $parent_id * @param int $level * @return array */function make_tree2($data = [], $parent_id = 0, $level = 0){ $tree = []; if ($data && is_array($data)) { foreach ($data as $v) { if ($v['parent_id'] == $parent_id) { $tree[] = [ 'id' => $v['id'], 'level' => $level, 'title' => $v['title'], 'parent_id' => $v['parent_id'], 'children' => make_tree2($data, $v['id'], $level + 1), ]; } } } return $tree;} 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465/** *  * @param array $data * @param int $id * @param int $level * @return array */function getSubTree($data = [], $id = 0, $level = 0){ static $tree = []; foreach ($data as $key => $value) { if ($value['parent_id'] == $id) { $value['laravel'] = $level; $tree[] = $value; getSubTree($data, $value['id'], $level + 1); } } return $tree;}/** *  * @param array $data * @param int $id * @param int $level * @return array */function getSubTree($data = [], $id = 0, $level = 0){ static $tree = []; foreach ($data as $key => $value) { if ($value['parent_id'] == $id) { $value['laravel'] = $level; $tree[] = $value; getSubTree($data, $value['id'], $level + 1); } } return $tree;}/** *  * @param array $data * @param int $id * @param int $level * @return array */$tree = []; //function getSubTree($data = [], $id = 0, $level = 0){ global $tree; foreach ($data as $key => $value) { if ($value['parent_id'] == $id) { $value['laravel'] = $level; $tree[] = $value; getSubTree($data, $value['id'], $level + 1); } } return $tree;} pid 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536/** * getParentsByParentId2($categories, 9) * * @param array $data * @param $parent_id * @return array */function getParentsByParentId($data = [], $parent_id){ static $categories = []; if ($data && is_array($data)) { foreach ($data as $item) { if ($item['id'] == $parent_id) { $categories[] = $item; getParentsByParentId($data, $item['parent_id']); } } } return $categories;}function getParentsByParentId2($data = [], $parent_id){ $categories = []; if ($data && is_array($data)) { foreach ($data as $item) { if ($item['id'] == $parent_id) { $categories[] = $item; $categories = array_merge($categories, getParentsByParentId2($data, $item['parent_id'])); } } } return $categories;}

posts.title: PHP
posts.text: OOP  php <?php/** *  * Interface kitchenWare */interface kitchenWare { /** *  * @param Food $food * @return mixed */ public function process(Food $food); /** *  * @return mixed */ public function hasProcess();}/** *  * Class MicrowaveOven */class MicrowaveOven implements kitchenWare{ /** *  * @var bool */ protected $is_heat = false; /** * @param Food $food * @return mixed|string */ public function process(Food $food) { if ($this->hasProcess()) { return ''; } else { if ($food->hasShuck() || $food->hasPericarp()) { return ''; } else { $this->is_heat = true; return ''; } } } /** *  * @return bool|mixed */ public function hasProcess() { return $this->is_heat; }}/** *  * Class Oven */class Oven implements kitchenWare{ /** *  * @var bool */ protected $is_heat = false; /** * @param Food $food * @return mixed|string */ public function process(Food $food) { if ($this->is_heat) { return ''; } else { if ($food->hasShuck()) { return ''; } else { $this->is_heat = true; return ''; } } } /** *  * @return bool|mixed */ public function hasProcess() { return $this->is_heat; }}/** *  * Class Food */class Food{ /** *  * @var bool */ protected $is_shuck = false; /** *  * @var bool */ protected $is_pericarp = false; /** * Food constructor. * @param bool $is_shuck * @param bool $is_pericarp */ public function __construct(bool $is_shuck, bool $is_pericarp) { $this->is_shuck = $is_shuck; $this->is_pericarp = $is_pericarp; } /** *  * @return bool */ public function hasShuck() { return $this->is_shuck; } /** *  * @return bool */ public function hasPericarp() { return $this->is_pericarp; }}/** *  * Class Cooking */class Cooking{ /** * @var kitchenWare */ protected $kitchenWare; /** * Cook constructor. * @param kitchenWare $kitchenWare */ public function __construct(kitchenWare $kitchenWare) { $this->kitchenWare = $kitchenWare; } /** *  * @param Food $food * @return mixed */ public function cooking(Food $food) { $data = $this->kitchenWare->process($food); return $data; }}/** *  * @return mixed */function test(){ $cooking = new Cooking(new MicrowaveOven()); $food = new Food(false, false); $result = $cooking->cooking($food); $result2 = $cooking->cooking($food); var_dump($result, $result2);}/** *  * @return mixed */function test2(){ $cooking = new Cooking(new Oven()); $food = new Food(false, true); $result = $cooking->cooking($food); $result2 = $cooking->cooking($food); var_dump($result, $result2);}test();test2();
